sourcesContent:
import Wrapper from '../components/wraper' import '@hackclub/theme/fonts/reg.css' import { BaseStyles, Badge, Box, Button, Card, Checkbox, Container, Flex, Grid, Heading, Input, Label, Link, NavLink, Radio, Select, Slider, Text, Textarea } from 'theme-ui' import Head from 'next/head' function HomePage() { return ( IDT Project Raleigh's IDT project about careers, written in next.js with theme-ui. (Press the circle for dark mode!) Career related to Programming: Database administrator.

A database administrator is a person who manages databases.
Duties:

  • Installing and upgrading the database server and application tool
  • Enrolling users and maintaining system security
  • Backing up and restoring databases
Main skills:
  • Patience
  • Meticulous attention to detail
  • A logical approach to work
Average Salary: $75k/year
Education required: Bachelor's degree

) } export default HomePage
